songs.title: Daydreams
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Cage]
Who called 911? Did you call 911? Who called 911?
(Get this press outta here)
Did you kill this girl?  Did you kill the girl?
Hey get this press outta here; get everybody outta here!
Did you kill the girl?

[Verse 1: Cage]
I met this chick in the club
Took her to the telly for back rubs
Split a dozen Dutches, ate a hundred drugs
We trippin' face, I'm like yo sit on my face
She like "I got a rag unless you like the way it taste"
Should I kick you in the cunt?, no?
So pass the blunt
She bent over the bed and said "yo, do what you want"
So I entered like a bull, til the cavity was full
Looked down my dick was a knife and I took her life

[Hook]X2
Daydream being a murderer, killer
Assassinator, death coordinator, executioner
With a presidential finger
I blow up countries in death lips my name linger

[Verse 2: Cage]
Wake from this nightmare can't even see clear
Shootin' my grip off through the wall catch my moms in the ear
Run downstairs tripped over dead siblings
Covered in my sister's blood
Fell out the crib limbs
Hanging from chains and red sky while black rains
Floatin' the bodies of the slain cloggin' up sewer drains
Trying to save the drowning, clingin' on to
My kayak but I slice off their hands as I paddle through
With razor oars, 16 hearts pump darts out of my pores
And killed passersby doors
Perception, close up, ketaset cloggin' my nose up
See myself in a precinct and my head blows up

[Hook]X2
Daydream being a murderer, killer
Assassinator, death coordinator, executioner
With a presidential finger
I blow up countries and dead lips my name linger

[Verse 3: Cage]
So I'm in front of the judge the jury says "you fucked"
"slice his knife with his own fucking throat..."
[overlapping] "suck the life out of his eyes.."
("Kill him") till the piece of shite dies
Fuck it do as you will I welcome all flies
I jumped from my seat attacked the judge with his mallet
My girl was like "chill Alex"
I bust the judge head till he dead "see you with the worms"
Hung the jury "this court is adjourned"

[Hook til fade]
Daydream being a murderer, killer
Assassinator, death coordinator, executioner
With a presidential finger
I blow up countries and dead lips my name linger
